thread.section_title: Ding Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ding | www.ding.com
thread.title: tamz

author: tamz
title: tamz
text: This is a very good site to top up your cellular number. One of the things I like about the site is that you do not need to know the service provider in order to select payment, once the number is entered it can automatically search for the provider. Nice for those who travel and are unaware of the service providers or nice for if you are in for a quick top up. I would have given the site a 5 but the charges are a bit high.
